sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react"; import moment from 'moment'; import axios from "axios"; class InfoGeneral extends Component{ state = { informacionTotal: [], informacionPrincipal: [] } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=Medellin&lang=sp&units=metric&appid=f0e5a162320155ed3912e1cbaa66d4b2') .then((response)=>{ this.setState({informacionTotal: response.data}) this.setState({informacionPrincipal: response.data.main}) console.log('===================================='); console.log(response.data); console.log('===================================='); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }) } render(){ moment.defineLocale('fakeLocale', {parentLocale:'es-mx'}); return (
{moment().format('dddd')}
{moment().format("DD/MMM/YY")}
Medellin
{this.state.informacionPrincipal.temp}oC
20% 18km/h East
Tuesday
23oC
18o
Wednesday
23oC
18o
Thursday
23oC
18o
Friday

18o
Saturday
23oC
18o
Sunday
23oC
18o
); } } export default InfoGeneral;
